page.title: 06THE MERRION CENTRE LEEDS
page.content: THIS IS A POPULAR (SHOPPING CENTRE) AND LOCAL POEPLE SHOP HERE ABOUT ONCE A WEEK.ITS POPULARITY IS DUE TO THE LOCATION OF THE CENTRE IN RELATION TO DIRECT BUS ROUTE AND PLACES OF WORK. POEPLE USING THE CENTRE FELT THAT MORE CLOTHES SHOPS AND BETTER LIGHTING ARE NEEDED,AS WELL AS LESS SLIPPERY FLOORS.THE MAJORITY OF PEOPLE ENJOYED THE FRIENDLY ATMOSHERE WITHIN THE CENTRE.A LOCAL (HOTEL MANAGER) FELT THAT THE ENVIRONMENT AS TOO BUILT UP BUT THAT RECENT DEVELOPMENTS IN THE AREA COULD BRING BUSINESS TO THE HOTEL.ON INTERVIEWING (SHOPKEEPERS) IN THE CENTRE, IT WAS FOUND THAT THE YOUNGER GENERATION IS THE PRIMARY CONSUMER AND THAT SATURDAY IS THE BUSIEST DAY.PEOPLE FEEL THAT IMPROVEMENTS NEED TO BE CARRIED OUT SOONIF THE CENTRE IS TO MAINTAIN IT'S ATMOSPHERE AND STANDARDS OF SHOPPING.
